data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Class::Prevayler (my wishname :-) is a perl implementation of the
    Prevayler-Concept. There are already implementations for Java, Ruby,
    Python, .NET, Smalltalk.

    You can find an introduction into Prevayler/Object Prevalence on
    www.prevayler.org.

    Prevayler is something like an object-persistence-database. It
    works by serializing command-objects and re-applaying them to the
    system after crash or shutdown.

    I think it fits better into the 'Class'-Namespace than in something
    like 'DBD'.

    Thanks!
